channel.title: [PI] Pk server
channel.description:
I request a PI Pk-Server as the title says. I want a perfect PK server (Totally no bugs) such as the good servers like Emps-Scape, Near reality and other perfect servers..
-Pking miningames included if possible (such as Duel Arena, Castle Wars, Clan Wars.. etc...) -Working all weapons and their special attack with no bugs. -Perfect Dharok's PK..
I really want a server like this, because every server I download I explore so many bugs in the wilderness and PK. I hope you understood me guys, looking forward for your comments and help!
Thanks, Osama

item.title: [PI] Pk server
item.dc:creator: @Combatx Combatx
item.description:
@Combatx wrote:

Every server has bugs whether big or small, what you’ve asked for you’ll probably have to code your self its very basic just time consuming.

Brandon

Read full topic
